name: Kountry_bow_ Keith
text: Best place for a squatted truck meet

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Michael Mitchum
text: Tim and Tracy the rest of the staff are amazing. Best gun prices here and the customer service is top notch. Tim is very knowledgeable about the products they carry and other ones they can order. I have purchased 6 guns from here total now and always get an amazing deal and service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We very much appreciate your business and we can't wait to have you back!

name: Jacob Lee
text: By far the best Pawn Shop in the area! Competent and very friendly staff and a very nice and clean place. The staff were knowledgeable and made appropriate and competitive offers for the items I wanted to pawn or sell. It was refreshing to walk into a pawn shop that felt like an actual store, compared to most Pawn Shops that have product in disarray on the shelves and you feel dirty when you leave. Keep up the good work guys!

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Brittney Kirkland
text: I got my wedding ring sized through them within the last 2 weeks. When I got to the car my husband realized that the piece that connected the 2 rings together was broken off. Took it immediately back into the shop and the older woman working there told him that it was “probably removed for sizing”. Spoke with 2 jewelers from 2 other business to verify that it should have been removed and both of them said that there would have been absolutely no need in removing that part and that it was probably done accidentally and they are just saying that it “had to be removed” to cover themselves and not take ownership.  I absolutely will not go to money mizer again. And to think that my husband was about to purchase 2 guns from this location this month. We will definitely be taking our business elsewhere from now on, as will my entire family.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Management has just became aware of this incident. Please reach out to our store manager, Ashley, regarding this and we will be more than happy to assist you and rectify the troubles you have had regarding the resizing of the wedding set.

name: MIsael Arenas
text:
Went in to inquire about some handguns, one man was behind the counter on the phone and did not acknowledge us there. Another couple male and female was behind main counter, no greeting nor asked if we needed help today? Ever other shop I been to knows how to greet you.
From the looks of the shop it did not have many items to bargain for. Guns where over priced by hundreds even shotgun over priced. Not many electronic.

resp.text: We apologize for your unsatisfactory customer service. We do pride ourselves on our customer service and are sincerely sorry if you were not helped or felt ignored. It was not our intention to upset you and would be more than happy to try to make things right. We are willing to price match any item we can as well as are willing to work with any price on used items. We are low on electronics becasue of the holiday sales we have been having and have sold out of most, however, we do have new items that come out every day. Please come down and let us make things right. Thank you for shopping with us in the first place and we do hope to see you again soon.

name: Sarah Lawrence
text: Clean and organized inside! Staff is amazing! They are very friendly and knowledgeable! Wonderful experience overall.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your experience with Money Mizer!

name: Casandra Ridgell
text: I have always had great shopping experiences at this location. The staff is super friendly, very helpful, and knowledgeable about items in their store. Charlotte knows us by name and she’s knows what we like to buy. She’s always ready to tell us what she has waiting when we walk in the door. I would recommend this store if you like pawn shopping.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Ike Bubins
text: Worst gun shop I've ever been to. Called on the phone and put me on hold. I finally drove down there I wanted a holster and the man pointed to the end of the counter and said they're down there. No help sad pathetic Gun Shop

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for any troubles you encountered with us. If you were placed on hold and not gotten back to, it was only because of how extremely busy we we can be at times. It is never our intention to make customers feel like we are ignoring them and if you come back down, we would be more than glad to help you with anything you need. We pride ourselves in customer service and will do whatever it takes to make sure our customers are happy.

name: kendra velez
text: Fantastic customer service from Christy! Very knowledgeable, patient and welcoming. It felt like I was with family. Great items from jewelry, tools, guns etc with great prices.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Courtney Young
text: Money Mizer Phenix City is my go to store for getting electronics, jewelry, and guns. I’ve even bought fishing equipment from this location. Staff is friendly and helpful even when they are really busy.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Ian Willett
text: I have Purchased numerous Items from this location with no issues and great prices.  I went in to sell them an item and they insulted me with the offer.  I understand they need to make money and never wanted full price for the value.  I even had an official appraisal letter and they didn’t even come within 25% of the value.  I was told it was because they could not find anything like it on the “auction” web site they use. Disappointing visit.  Will never return.

resp.text: We are very sorry you feel like our offer was unfair. We do appreciate the feedback.

name: Charles Richmond
text: Excellent and friendly staff. Very knowledgeable in firearms and jewelry.  Prices are competitive and you get your moneys worth.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

text: Best pawn franchise I've experienced; I never shop other stores. Best deals, best customer service without equal!!  Try it. You can't go wrong!!

text: Horrible service at front desk very disrespectful, very unprofessional, and the sad thing is I been buying weapons with a vaild state DL along side my Retired military identification  not to mention my gun permit there for years and they have a very professional and very knowledgeable gentlemen who sells or displays weapons which is the only reason i go there and i appreciate his knowledge and approachability but i will no longer be shopping there...

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We do apologize if you feel you were mistreated when you came in today, but with all firearm purchases, you must present a valid state ID and the ID we were presented with was expired. We would be more than happy to work with you if you bring in a valid state ID. Please feel free to contact us and we will work anything out with you we can. Thank you.

text: Don't give you near enough money for the items you pawn with them and there's a lot of extremely rude employees that give you different offers depending on the person that brings in the items.

Hello Richard,

We apologize for your recent experience in our store and will address our staff accordingly. We do try our best to present fair offers to our customers regarding their belongings. Each item is different and we make our offers based on the make, model, and condition of the item. We would appreciate if you gave us another chance to serve you in the future. Thank you.

name: Jarl Balgruuf
text: They used to have a really good selection of guns here, but the last several times I've been there (over the last 2 years or so) they haven't had much.  The staff is friendly.  I usually have good conversations about WWII weaponry and whatnot when I go in here, but it's rare I buy anything.  Back when they had big selections of consignment guns you could find some good collectors items but nowadays it's mostly just the same old stuff any pawn shop has.  I don't really have a reason to bother going in there anymore, sadly.

name: Eddy Gilley
text:
Made my first visit a week ago. On second visit (WED) purchased two firearms. These guys take the time to answer your questions. I did not know they existed until I was leaving Larry's and saw their billboard--I'm glad I did.

Whether you are experienced and just looking for "great deals" or new to firearms, you owe it to yourself to visit them before you make a purchase.

name: Eric Tanner
text: Years ago, it used to be one of my favorite gun shops.  I purchased my first pistol to conceal here.  Sadly, after the robbery things when downhill fast.  The gun selection is terrible and service not very good.  I keep going back to browse when I have extra time in hopes that it will win me back over but I think I have made my last visit here.  It pains me to say because it is in my city and very close to my house, but currently there are far better gun shops in the area to have to settle for this one.

name: Matt Hammond
text: Always friendly and helpful. Have purchased a couple rifles from them and they have handled two FFL transfers as well. Best price I have found on FFL transfer. Only 4 stars because the selection can be limited at times. 5 star service and attitude though!

name: Justin Garrett
text: I just used CG&T for a FFL transfer and was very pleased. Lowest price FFL transfer in my area. The two gentleman there were very pleasant and easy to deal with. I brought my 4 year old son with me and they even patiently answered any questions he had. They also had a good selection of firearms and accessories in a clean organized store.

name: rodneyvaughn
text: Great place to do business.  Employees are very easy to talk to and everything is reasonably priced.  Nothing but good experiences here.

text: Was only in the store for like 6 minutes and I learned some stuff and got exactly what I went in for. Also the guy that helped me was super duper pleasant and helpful, all in all a pretty kick ass place

name: barry white
text: Make sure the guy behind the counter has his diaper on before "touching" anything. It disappoints me greatly that people have inventory that they know nothing about. He literally tried to grab a pvs14 out of my hand for removing a lense cover to inspect the lense.  It wasn't turned on nor would it hurt an auto gated device to be exposed to artificial light.. Sorry guy. you had a chance. you blew it horribly. will never be back. A word of advice: if you're scared to let folks look at merchandise; perhaps you have chosen the wrong career path.

name: Fred Sanford
text:
I asked a simple question about the difference between two AR's. I was ignored the first time, and received a rude answer that I will not print here when I repeated the question a few minutes later.
I will not be back.

text: I was charged twice for a purchase. Upon noticing it that night, I printed off my bank records and went to the store with receipt in hand. I was told they have no way of knowing if I made the purchase twice. Upon threatening legal / criminal action they told me all I'd ever get is store credit. I was forced to take store credit and used it on the spot, never to return again.

name: bryan Moore
text: Worst customer relations I have ever seen. The owner told my wife she should always carry her pistol with one in the chamber! We have a small child!

text: Called this place asking if they had a gun mount for a wall and the guy acted like a complete douche.  Haven't shopped here but after talking with him on the phone I don't think I ever will.

name: Craig Stiles
text: Absolutely the WORST customer service I've experienced in my entire life! I purchased a new, still in the box home defense shotgun on Wednesday 1/20/21. That afternoon when I put the barrel on it. (it comes with the barrel off in the box) When I attempted to "rack" the pump action, it would not move, when I removed the barrel the forearm with the slides came off leaving the receiver in the gun. I immediately put the gun back in the box and contacted SWAT. I told them what had happened, asked if they had another gun of the same make and model in the box, and they said yes. I returned the gun on Friday 1/22/21, at which time, i was informed that I would have to ship the gun to the manufacturer at MY expense as a "warranty" issue. I questioned their definition of warranty, being the gun had never even had a shell put in it. They employee then said he would attempt to REPAIR the gun, and would contact me. I was contacted the next day and told it was fixed. I told him I was unable to come to the store that day, but would contact them the following Tuesday, because they're closed on Mondays. Not wanting an out of the box repaired gun, I asked for a refund, at which time, my request  refused and was hung up on by the store owner. I've notified my bank, have disputed the charge and will get my money back. The bank said they'll handle getting reimbursed from SWAT. Buyer Beware!!! I had to put 1 star before being allowed to post, but would had rated the a minus 5 if allowed!

resp.text: We are known throughout north Alabama (and beyond) for our excellent customer service, fantastic selection and low prices. Please read our many 5 star reviews and then come see us and decide for yourself. Thanks and Semper Fi!!

They treat you like a brother, know their stuff about guns, and they have the best gun shop in the region.  I'll give only them my business in North Alabama.  I go often and have purchased many guns from them as well as ammo.  They also have an active Facebook page that is very up to date.

SWAT is by far the best gun store in Lauderdale county.!

Ammo prices stay close enough to the lowest prices available on the internet that its worth a couple bucks to buy the case of ammo local.

Every gun owner in this area should Support this Local gun store..!!

I was very pleased with a few trade ins I have made in the past.  I have referred many people to SWAT Guns & Ammo during the past few months. text: Will never go in this place again. Said they couldn't legally sell me a gun because I had a disorderly conduct over 10 years ago. I also have a pistol permit lol

text: I went in yesterday for the second time and was greeted by a familiar face.  If anyone needs any work done they have a walking gun encyclopedia who happens to do some great gunsmith work on staff now. Good to see him working again and not just hanging around pawn shops!  Their selection is pretty good and very diverse for such a small store, there are lots of cool old & new guns to choose from.  The only downside is that they're so far away from where I live in Russellville but IMO the trip is well worth the drive to get some competent counter service for a change.  Before I had to go all the way to Larry's to get an honest opinion on a gun but now I can just go to SWAT.  A+++ I'll be back and I'll bring friends!

text: Can't comment on their prices really (which seems to be the only negative thing i've heard about this place based on these reviews) but I personally really like this store. Every time I've been in to buy ammo (which is very fairly priced) I've been greeted by super friendly people. I went in today and it was my first time in since they've "expanded" their shop, and it was a surprise to me how big the selection was. Tons of pistols especially, and I like the way they have everything laid out so the consumer can handle it without having to bother employees to get each gun out of a case. I haven't purchased a gun here (mainly because they didn't have a large selection last time I was in) but now that I've seen the new shop, I'll definitely be back to pick up something (other than ammo). Other shops should especially take notes on the friendliness in this store.

text: This Used to be one of the best pawn shops around. Since they have changed locations though, they have become rather difficult. resp.text: Hello Tonya, I am very sorry to hear about your experience at our store.  We pride ourselves on customer service, We have always greeted everyone that comes in with courtesy and respect.  That has not changed since we have moved.  All our price are negotiable and we rotate our inventory daily.   We strive hard to make everyone happy but realize this is impossible.  We encourage you to stop back in and give us another try.

name: Wargasm644
text: Went in to look for a guitar. Found a really nice one hanging on the wall. I know what they sell for at music stores and eBay. An employee named Alex asked me if I’d like to plug it in and check it out? A sure sign that the employees are confident in what they sell. After checking it out for fret wear and any obvious flaws, I wanted it. It was very nice and played fantastic! The price was reasonable too. Considering they have overhead and payroll to contend with the likes of eBay and Amazon. They landed me a VERY competitive price and I walked out with a super nice guitar! Alex and the entire staff were class acts and treated me like they really wanted my business. Something you don’t see much of anymore in this day and age. I know where I’m going when I need another guitar!  I would recommend anyone shopping pawn businesses and such to  check these guys out first! A++

name: matthew meskill
text:
Do not go to that huge pistol & pawn shop before going to Family! Wow! The staff is amazing, friendly and knowledgeable. The selection is fantastic, anything you could want! The prices are super competitive if not the lowest around. I put a lot of time and research in before I made my purchase and Family Jewelry  & Loan is the real deal!

PART 2

Wouldn't let me do another review so here's part 2. Another visit another fantastic experience! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! David & family have so many choices and options I feel like a kid in a candy store! I feel guilty taking up so much of their time, but not once have I felt rushed or heard that dreaded deep breath of hurry up and get out like you get other places. In you are looking for jewelry,  computers, tools, games, movies, guns shop here first!

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again in the future.

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
This might be the best pawn shop in town. The atmosphere was several degrees better than your average pawn shop - very clean and well lit, customer friendly, and the folks running the place were very conscientious and genuinely nice. We actually felt welcomed and appreciated for just stopping by to browse. Even my wife and teenager really liked the place and they are both easily "sketched-out" by any kind of second hand store.

I was really impressed with all the good stuff for sale. All of it was very nicely displayed too. There were guns of all kinds and other hunting equipment, tools, musical instruments, high-end sunglasses, games, sports equipment, rods and reels, portable air conditioners, TVs and other electronics - you name it - and LOTS of top quality jewelry. (I'm pretty sure wifey plans to sneak back over there without me :-0 )

The prices seem fair and are clearly marked, but don't be afraid to ask for an even better deal. I was able to negotiate a great price on a particular item I had been needing for a long time but could never bring myself to purchase. Now I am glad I waited.

This place is a 5-star business for sure.

Thanks, Family Jewelry and Loan!!

resp.text: Ralph Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We work really hard on keeping a clean, organized store.  We understand that a comfortable environment is really important now a days to make everyone feel welcome, and we strive to do this on a daily basis.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Todd Zelenka (zeltod)
text:
I stopped in the store at a recommendation from a friend at church.  I was looking for a ring for my wife to celebrate our 10 years together.  I have to say that the ring I found was an EXCELLENT deal - I am not a jewelry expert and was a little uneasy about buying jewelry from a pawn shop.  I was told that the shop would stand behind the ring and wrote the details about the ring on my receipt that they would guarantee.

The next day I went to a local jewelry store to see what kind of deal I got.  Man was I surprised - I not only got a confirmation of the details of the ring were 100% correct - I was told that the ring was worth 5 times what I paid for it......I couldn't have been happier.

To know that I got a great deal on a great piece of jewelry alone would bring me back to this store.  Then add the friendly, customer centered, genuine service I received from the staff and  I will be a customer for a long time.  In fact, I came back a couple weeks later and bought a cool watch.

Make this your first or last stop and you will be glad you did.

resp.text: Thank you Todd we appreciate your business and are glad your happy with your purchase.  We pride ourselves on having the BEST jewelry prices in town.

name: Robert Whitehead
text:
To my knowledge, this is one of only two places in the state where you can buy a Fort Knox safe. (The other one is in Florence, and is owned by the same family.) Fort Knox safes are probably the beefiest and best-made safes the average consumer can buy.

This merchant works out of a structural steel building on the same property as their home, so if you drive up the driveway, turn left at the top and you'll see the building.

This is not a plush showroom; think of it more like a warehouse. It's not fancy, but the prices are reasonable, and the staff is very knowledgeable. They do sell other brands (including imports from China), but Fort Knox is their best brand; they even carry vault doors.

The purchase price does not include delivery, and delivering the safe into a building incurs a variable fee, depending on the difficulty of setting it in place. You can send a video of the path into the final position to the merchant, and they can decide what the fee will be.

I enjoyed working with the sales staff (especially their rodent-control specialist, a 17-year-old brindled cat with a sweet personality), but unless you live nearby, I think I would recommend visiting their Florence location, as the trip from Huntsville took about two hours and ran through the Bankhead Forest.

name: Cage Williamson
text:
Called today to get a quote plus information on a gun safe to meet my specific needs. When I told the sales representative that I was looking for a safe with "fireproof" and "waterproof" ratings, she started talking over me and rudely "educating" me on how "those specifications do not exist". She claimed all other gun safe manufacturers with those specifications are liars. Rather than try to kindly educate a new customer on safe specifications to meet my needs, she instead spent her time trying to tear me down.

I had $1500 ready to spend today on an entry-grade home safe but I'll go elsewhere.

resp.text: Mr. Williamson, we sincerely appreciate your feedback and regret that you’ve had this experience. We’ve addressed the incident, and hope that you’ll consider us for your gun safe needs in the future. If you wish to reach the owner directly, please give Daryl  Rowe a call at 205-269-8569. We hope that you have a great day.

name: Robert Ryan
text: Daryl Rowe cares about his customers.  He delivered and installed my beautiful Fort Knox safe.  The installation was smooth and placed perfectly,   They are true experts who took double care to protect the floors with cloth and steel.   They were quick and efficient.  Showed me all the features and made sure I knew how to work the lock before he left.   You can't go wrong with Southland Safes.

name: Douglas Max Young II (maxzmillion)
text: Today was my first time interacting with the company. I talked with Nancy. I was asked by my business partner to call and find out what options we had to get into a steel door with a keycode lock where the batteries had died. At some point the packet with the keys had been lost either during transit or by the end customer. When I told her that I was calling on behalf of my business partner, she immediately cut me off and told me "I already told him once that he has to contact Browning because he has to replace that whooole lock system. They only have one set of keys per lock and their all different keys so he's going to have to replace that whole thing". The delivery of this was with a very transactional tone so the customer service aspect was not great. One of the reasons that I was calling her was to verify what model of lock they actually sold our customer but after the initial interaction, I really didn't want to talk to her further so I called the next company in the chain of distribution. The problem with the lock system that was sold is that it is electronic and the batteries lock to the inside so there is no access once they die unless you have a key, and if there is no key, then you are looking at a major intervention. Again, I'm not blaming this company for the loss of the key, just a note about the transactional nature of the customer service.

Glad I did my research before spending any money. Otherwise the cashiers are friendly and the inventory isn't a mess or disorganized.

text: Their staff is amazing.  While they are definitely overworked, they remain smiling & helpful despite the overwhelming stress of not being properly staffed to serve all customer traffic.  I witnessed one customer berate an employee because the checkout line was too long of a wait. Yes - it was long, but it's not the fault of the employee, she was working as quickly as she could despite the occasional random customer walked up & interrupted her with some  question, meanwhile she's trying to continue checking out the many patiently-waiting customers in inline. Let's all remember the employees deserve our appreciation & patience during busy shopping times...and they don't make more money during those times, just more stress while the corporate folks take in the sales profits. Just try to treat everyone with the same respect you would like to receive from them.  And Academy employees deserve raises & more hired staff to create a sales team force!!!

name: John Pritchett
text: I am heading to do hurricane relief work in Big Pine Key and am gathering supplies to take with the group of us going down there. I needed to purchase some steel stakes to secure palm trees that are damaged from the storm. I went to the Montgomery Academy Sports Store and purchased these stakes. I talked with the salesman in the back and notified him of our mission and asked him if they could give us some kind of discount and was told no. I asked him to ask the manager and he did and the manager said no. When checking out of the store the manager was up front chit chatting with an employee and a customer ( doing nothing) and I again asked him face to face if he could help us out and he again said no. All the other companies have been good about discounting supplies. Lowe's of Wetumpka,  Marvins in Millbrook,  Harbour Freight,  Home Depot all have been helpful especially Lowe's in Wetumpka. After being told no face to face I told him I appreciated it and then proceeded to name the other companies that have responded responsibly. I have bought alot of product from academy over the years but this experience has left a bad test in my mouth with the company and particularly with this manager. 🚷

name: Emily Doner
text: I have not been to Academy since last spring because of poor service. I just went online ordered a pair of shoes stated I could pick up at the store within the hour. I received a call from the store that they didn’t have my item and that it would be best if I canceled my order. That my money hadn’t been taken out of my account. I tried to cancel online but it kept freezing up. I called the corporate customer service waited on hold for over 30 minutes and then they cut my call off. I then called the Decatur store back and ask for a manager. The girl that answered said “ I’m a manager” she was short and rude with me . Said they would cancel my order and I would get a email or text when it was taken care of. I did receive it and it stated my money would not be back in my bank account until 7 business days. So isn’t that great!! Academy ruins a Christmas present for my daughter. And has not a second thought or concern for me . I tried to do the right thing order from home social distance for everyone’s safety and this is the thanks I get. I paid for an item last spring $ 700 and basically the same thing happened only difference is they didn’t have my purchased item so I had to buy a $100 higher item of the same kind. I guess you make so much money that I make no difference. So I am sure I won’t be missed. But very poor service and no compassion for taking someone’s money at Christmas.. Merry Christmas Academy Sports Decatur!!

text: I stop ever time I go to Decatur if I have time always have something I need and always have something I want the staff is second to none .the manager goes out of his way to help everyone that he deals with no matter if they spend $10 or a $1000 , I'm a big gun nut and his gun counter people own guns too and I have seen them at the range and that helps on sales because they know what they are talking about instead of reading it off the box.,To me it's like going to the garage to have you truck checked out and the mechanic has to borrow a car to get to work do you really want to spend money there if he doesn't know what he is talking about? You don't have worry about that here these guys are willing to show you the deer they shot ,a pic of how they done at the range or how big of a fish they just caught and how proud of their kids or grandkids done on the ball field

name: Jordan Morgan
text: Bought work shoes for my husband and they ended up being too small, so he went to return them the next day August 7 and it is now August 20 and still no return. I've talked to managers and customer service reps and basically have been told this store is very lacking on communication and when my husband talked to one of the managers in the store, since no one would answer the phone, they fed us a lie that it was out of their hands when truly they are the only ones who can clear the matter according to the many customer service reps I've spoke with. We are now on two weeks and still waiting for over a $100 purchase return. They could have sold the shoes in this time. They basically stole from us and we are at their mercy. My suggestion is don't do any business with these people. The carelessness I've experienced has been the biggest headache and for something that is truly so simple as a debit in-store return.

text: This was our first visit to this store, looking for a pair of tennis shoes and they did have a good selection of shoes but the service was at best just "ok". My wheelchair bound husband finally found a young man to help us but all he wanted to do was stand behind us and tell us what numbers to look for. I finally asked him if he would help my husband find the shoes he was looking for, but we found them before he actually made a move to assist us. While he was polite but unhelpful the checkout guy was helpful but verbally unpolite  with a "smart alec" attitude. I don't know what the problem was with the staff today, but we probably won't be back.
